meanings.definition: Practiced or recited in preparation for a public performance.
meanings.sent1: The rehearsed actors delivered a flawless play.
meanings.sent2: The singer's rehearsed performance wowed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The rehearsed dance routine brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her rehearsed speech was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The rehearsed magic trick left everyone amazed.

meanings.definition: Repeated or practiced in order to improve or perfect.
meanings.sent1: She rehearsed her lines for the play every day.
meanings.sent2: He rehearsed his tennis serve to get better at it.
meanings.sent3: The cat rehearsed its meow to sound more convincing.
meanings.sent4: The students rehearsed their presentation until it was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The chef rehearsed the recipe to ensure it was just right.
